des:
With Adax skill and Alexa, you can now control your Adax thermostat hands free. Just tell Alexa what you want and Adax devices will do it.

When using the skill, you need to specify by name which thermostat/plug to use. Use the name you set up already – these are shown in the Adax WiFi app and can be changed in settings on each device. You can also add Adax devices to new or existing groups in the Alexa app.

Once you know the name of your thermostat/plug, you can give voice commands to Alexa.

Thermostat
After connecting Alexa to your Adax thermostat, you can say commands like:
"Alexa, set [bedroom] temperature to 24"
"Alexa, set heater to 20 degrees"
"Alexa, decrease thermostat temperature by 2 degrees"
“Alexa, what is the [thermostat name] set to?”
"Alexa, what is the temperature in the [kitchen]?"

Plug
After connecting Alexa to your Adax Smart Plug, you can say commands like:
"Alexa, turn on the plug"
"Alexa, turn off [plug name]"
